2048.description: 2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!
howToPlay: Use mouse to click and interact
Use keyboard arrow keys to move

make-ten.title: Make Ten
make-ten.description:
The Deluxe Edition is out! Including no-timer mode, daily mode, gravity modes, and 35+ wild others.
Select numbers that add to ten, to remove them from the board. How high can you score in just 2 minutes? Try again by pressing Enter!
An homage to Fruit Box. A FruitBox-like? There are some big differences in this version, the most obvious being the lack of music -- the music in the original is incredible.
> how to play
Drag your mouse to select groups of numbers that add up to 10.Press Enter to pause. (restart / change volume)Click the bottom-right icon to play in fullscreen. (it's easier to click on larger numbers)
In the original game, you're awarded one point per number removed,Get the highest score you can within 2 minutes. Good luck!

factor-crafter.title: Factor Crafter
factor-crafter.description:
Welcome to the world of Factor Crafter, where elemental stones obey the laws of multiplication. Prime numbers form the basic elements, and can be combined together to create composites.
 Fill up your almanac as you multiply  Prime gems and factor Composite stones.
Features: 40 levels, an almanac of 100 stones, Sandbox mode, and Endless mode.
Topics: Multiplication, factorization, Common Multiples, Common Factors, logarithms, and variables.
Accessibility: Sound is optional. No time limits. Mouse-only. Strong English-reading ability is recommended.
U.S. Standards: This game covers most of common core standard 4.OA.B.4 (4th grade), 6.NS.B.4 (6th grade), introductory algebra concepts (8th grade), and logarithms (11th grade). SFX from soundeffectsplus.com, pacdv.com, and soundimage.org.
Install Instructions:
WebGL (Browser, Chromebook) Extract files, then open "index" file to run in web browser. [This has not been tested on Chromebooks, but it probably works.]
Windows PC: Extract files, then open "Factor Crafter" executable file to run.
Android: As this game is not purchased from an app store, you may be warned that the file is "not from an authorized source", or "potentially unsafe". You may need to edit your settings to "install apps from unknown sources". The installable .apk file is  typically stored in your "Downloads" folder. Do a web search for 'install apk on [your Android device]' for more information.

cubes-2048.description: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive and unique multiplayer puzzle game that seamlessly merges the classic Snake and 2048 games! Are you ready to make your snake grow as big as possible as you accumulate cubes and become the biggest and most extensive snake on the screen?Run through a stage full of enemies while dodging the bigger ones and devouring the smaller ones. Merge identical figures to increase the size and number of your cubes and reach the highest figure to achieve the final victory. Good luck!Who created Cubes 2048.io?This game was developed by Playmost Games.

animal-dna-run.description: Animal DNA Run is a casual game where you can mix animal DNA to create new and unique creatures. Each animal has its own abilities, so make sure you mix animal DNA according to your needs. For example, combine the DNA of a shark and a tiger to create an animal that can swim yet run very fast, or a monkey and an eagle to create an animal that can climb rocks and fly over cliffs!

quantum-god.title: Quantum God
quantum-god.description: Quantum God is a clicker game where the game concept is based on the universe expansion theory. The main mechanic is to increase the size of your universe. In this game you will buy various physical objects and thereby increase your income. Also, you can upgrade your buildings by resetting their number to one. When you will gather enough size, you will be able to gain prestige points named "U-Coins". There are also several achievements in the game, and you will receive various rewards for completing them. You will go from the size of neutrinos to the size of humans, stars, galaxies, and even much larger objects!
howToPlay: Use mouse to click and interact
Use keyboard arrow keys to move

You can even add another skeleton to see their funny interactions!
